annotations.description: El Dorado Punch was first published in a section of new drinks at the very end of the 1876 edition of Jerry Thomas' How To Mix Drinks. It was inspired by ano...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: El Dorado Punch

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Brandy 
.5oz (15ml) Jamaican Rum
.5oz (15ml)  Bourbon
1oz (30ml) Lemon Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
Seasonal Fruit Garnish

Shake and pour into glass. 
Top with crushed ice

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dGtPoZQGkI8
title: El Dorado Punch
